name: Ball Platformer (itch) (Sviashennik666)
description:
Welcome to the Ball game. Features of the game:
  • 47 different levels
  • control the ball
  • beware of obstacles
  • riddles
  • go through mazes everywhere, both light and dark
  • Have fun and be scared
The game will be updated and supplemented in the future !Perhaps there are errors in translation and inconspicuous bugs that were not found when testing the game! There may be errors in the translation, if you find them, write under the post "STARTING THE GAME"age limit: 6+
